PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-19852009-12-10,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActFederal Courts Act
SubjectRules Amending the Federal Courts Rules (Summary Judgment and Summary Trial)
PrecisRules Amending the FEDERAL COURTS RULES (SUMMARY JUDGMENT AND SUMMARY TRIAL) to establish a summary trial proceeding in addition to motions for summary judgment. These amendments enable the Court to determine an issue or action by way of summary trial even though there is conflicting evidence or issues of credibility which, prior to these amendments, would have required a full trial.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0331 Publication Date: 2009-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment

These amendments enable the Court to determine an issue or action by way of summary trial even though there is conflicting evidence or issues of credibility which, prior to these amendments, would have required a full trial.
